body.h2: Provision of Advice and Information to Patients and Carers
body.h3: 01-Jul-2004 11:30 - Advice to carer regarding child's behaviour (Advice to mother)
body.p:
If James' wheeze returns she is to contact the surgery immediately. James is to avoid contact with anybody who has Chickenpox over the next 3 months. If he does have contact he should be seen ASAP.
Member of : active Problem : Cough (Cough present for last two days), 01-Jul-2004
